charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) is back from the dead and on a rampage. It does not concern him who he attacks or who is controlling him.

abilities.name: Needle Senbon
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) quickly uses Needle Senbon on one enemy dealing 15 damage. This skill will deal an additional 5 damage when it is used. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Hardened Spikes
abilities.description: Using Hardened Spikes Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) deals 15 damage to all enemies and stuns their physical and ranged skills for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Ranged Suppression
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) uses Ranged Suppression to force one enemy back and deal 15 damage for 2 turns. All skills that enemy uses during this skill will have 1 turn of additional cooldown. This skill cannot be used on a character already affected by it.

abilities.name: Hair Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
